name: Excidio The Kaiju Game
description:
Intro
Long time ago our world was ruled by giant Kaijus... The early humans worshiped some of them as Gods... and lived in fear of the rest for thousands of years… But then the Visitors came in search of a new home… They showed the primitive humans how to fight those monsters and not live in fear… After years of fighting humans won... but the cost was great … Visitors and their whole culture and advanced civilization were lost… Remaining humans overtime forgot all about The War and remaining monsters who hid in the deep of the earth and hibernated until time to rule came again! You now take control of one of those monsters and bring chaos to the world in sandbox mode or in story mode!

Play as Kaiju!


Take control of giant Kaijus and use its devastating attacks or size to destroy everything in your way!

Destructible maps


Play on large destructible maps with cities, villages, harbors, airports, etc…

Sandbox Mode

If story mode is not for you and you just want to destroy things there is Sandbox mode that you can play! Take the role of Kaiju and do what you want!
